    @NextUpdate
 @Deprecated
public class BnetBinaryDistributedExtCF
extends BnetBinaryDistributedCF
    This class implements extensive collaborative filtering algorithm based on distributed binary Bayesian networks.
    Version:
    10.0
    Author:
    Loc Nguyen
